Package com.example.lab3_restapi.fragments

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UserSettingsFragment
    This class is used to hold the view for the UserSettingsActivity.
    WeatherCollectionAdapter
    This class holds all the weather fragments used to display the forecasts' information for the different tabs.
    WeatherDailyFragment
    This class represent the daily forecast view used in the day tabs.
    WeatherFragment
    This class is the base class for the other forecast fragments and contains utility methods for those classes.
    WeatherHourlyFragment
    This class represent the hourly forecast view used in the Today tab.
    WeatherLiveFragment
    This class represent the live forecast view used in the Live tab.
    WeatherViewPagerFragment
    This class holds the ViewPager2 used to navigate between the different forecasts in the app.
